lemma sep_disj_fiction:
  â€¹ r âˆˆ FIC.SPACE
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—ğ–ºğ—ğ–¾ s ğ—‚ğ—Œ â„ INTERP r * { R.mk x }

            Ï†Res_Spec_def R.ğ—‹_valid_split'

            sep_disj_get_name_eq[symmetric]
            simp del: sep_disj_get_name_eq)
  using sep_disj_multD2 by force

lemma expand_subj:
  â€¹ r âˆˆ FIC.SPACE
âŸ¹ Ï†Res_Spec (â„ INTERP (r * mk (Ïˆ x)) ğ—Œğ—ğ–»ğ—ƒ r ## mk (Ïˆ x))
  = Ï†Res_Spec (â„ INTERP r * { R.mk x })â€º

  apply (clarsimp simp add: R.basic_fiction_â„ Ï†expns
            share.homo_sep_wand Ï†Res_Spec_def R.ğ—‹_valid_split'
            R.inject_wand_homo interp_split' prj.homo_mult)

  subgoal for res_r a r'
    apply (rule exI[where x=â€¹res_r * R.mk aâ€º]; rule)
    apply (metis R.inj.homo_mult R.sep_disj_mk fun_1upd_homo_right1 sep_mult_assoc')

  apply (clarsimp simp add: R.basic_fiction_â„ Ï†expns Ï†Res_Spec_def R.ğ—‹_valid_split'
        R.inject_wand_homo interp_split' sep_mult_assoc prj.homo_mult)

    have t1[simp]: â€¹y ## xâ€º
      using prems(5) prems(7) sep_disj_multD2 by force

    show ?thesis

      apply (rule exI[where x=â€¹aâ€º], rule exI[where x=â€¹R.mk (y * x)â€º])
      apply (metis R.inj.homo_mult fun_1upd_homo prems(5) prems(6) prems(7) sep_disj_multI2 share.homo_mult t1)
      by (metis prems(1) prems(8) sep_disj_get_name_eq share.sep_disj_homo_semi t1)

  qed .

lemma expand:
  â€¹ r âˆˆ FIC.SPACE

    Ï†Res_Spec (â„ INTERP r * {R.mk x})â€º

lemma partial_implies_raw:
  â€¹ r âˆˆ FIC.SPACE

            R.prj.homo_mult interp_split' prj.homo_mult)

     R.inject_wand_homo R.prj.homo_mult â„±_optionwise_â„ image_iff Bex_def
     â„±_agree_def prj.homo_mult)
  apply (cases â€¹get râ€º; simp)
  subgoal for u y a aa
    apply (cases aa; simp)
    subgoal premises prems for xa proof -
      have â€¹get r ## Some (agree (nosep x))â€º
        by (metis prems(2) sep_disj_get_name)
      from this [unfolded â€¹get r = _â€º, simplified]
      show ?thesis .
    qed . .

lemma double:
  â€¹{mk x |x. P x} ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ {mk x |x. P x} * {mk x |x. P x}â€º
  unfolding Imply_def
  apply (clarsimp simp add: Ï†expns mk_homo_mult[symmetric])
  subgoal for x'
    apply (rule exI[where x=â€¹mk x'â€º], rule exI[where x=â€¹mk x'â€º])
    by (cases x'; simp add: mk_homo_mult[symmetric]) .

lemma contract:
  â€¹{mk x |x. P x} * {mk x |x. P x} ğ—‚ğ—†ğ—‰ğ—…ğ—‚ğ–¾ğ—Œ {mk x |x. P x} â€º
  unfolding Imply_def
  apply (clarsimp simp add: Ï†expns)
  subgoal for x y by (cases x; cases y; simp add: mk_homo_mult[symmetric]) .

lemma "__allocation_rule__":
  â€¹ (âˆ€m. m âˆˆâ‡©S domain âŸ¶ m(k := u) âˆˆâ‡©S domain)
âŸ¹ k âˆ‰ dom1 (get res)
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—ğ–ºğ—ğ–¾ res ğ—‚ğ—Œ R
âŸ¹ ğ—Œğ—ğ–ºğ—ğ–¾ updt (Î»f. f(k := u)) res ğ—‚ğ—Œ R * {mk (1(k := u))}â€º
  unfolding Ï†Res_Sat_def Ï†Res_Spec_def
  apply (clarsimp simp add: ğ—‹_valid_split' times_set_def inject_wand_homo
          prj.homo_mult times_fun_upd)
  subgoal premises prems for m proof -
    {
      assume A: â€¹k âˆ‰ dom1 mâ€º
      have t2: â€¹m ## 1(k := u)â€º
        using A dom1_def sep_disj_fun_def by fastforce
      have t3: â€¹res(name := inject m) = resâ€º
        by (simp add: fun_upd_idem prems(5))
      have t1: â€¹res(name := inject (m(k := u))) = res * mk (1(k := u)) âˆ§ res ## mk (1(k := u))â€º
        thm fun_split_1_not_dom1[where f=m]
        apply (subst fun_split_1_not_dom1[where k=k]) using A apply this
        apply (simp add: t2 inj.homo_mult split)
        by (metis fun_1upd_homo_right1 fun_sep_disj_1_fupdt(1) inj.sep_disj_homo_semi t2 t3)
    }
    then show ?thesis
      using prems(2) prems(4) by blast
  qed .

end

subsubsection â€¹Construct Tupleâ€º

  where "cons_tup tys vs = (

  apply (metis (no_types, lifting) drop_all leI list.ctr_transfer(1) list.sel(1) list.simps(3) list_all2_Cons2 list_all2_appendI list_all2_rev1 rev.simps(2) take_hd_drop)
